events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your credentials and get back to you soon.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and resume details.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be your point of contact throughout the recruitment process.
We conducted an initial screening based on your application. We would like to schedule a technical interview to further evaluate your skills.
Thank you for your prompt response and willingness to proceed with the technical interview. We appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 14:00 UTC with our senior engineering team members.
The technical interview has been successfully completed. The panel was impressed with your problem-solving skills and coding expertise.
We have scheduled an HR interview to discuss company culture, benefits, and to answer any questions you may have.
Your HR interview was completed successfully. We enjoyed hearing about your motivations and career goals.
We are pleased to offer you a position as Software Engineer. Please review the attached offer letter and let us know your decision.
We have received your feedback on the offer and are happy to know the terms meet your expectations.
Congratulations on accepting our offer! We are excited to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started. You will receive all necessary information and access to begin your journey with us.
The hiring process is now complete. We look forward to your contributions as a member of our engineering team.
